name: Ben 10: Revenge of the Fallen
description:
Join Ben, Gwen, and Max for a silly lil' adventure against the dark forces of Hex.

This is a silly goofy game, probably not for children. There is mention of swear and some blood. Oopsie.

I am sorry.

This game is a silly fan-made parody made by a dumdum while they were horrifically ill. Ben 10 is owned by Cartoon Network and Man of Action. They do not endorse this game. They don't even know it exists.

hopeyouenjoyyy

Special Features Include:

-5 Locations!!!!!!!!!!!!1

-4 Secret Aliens!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

-1 Ending!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

-30 Minutes of Exciting and Epic Story Gameplay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
